user.title: Growatt Modbus Setup
user.description: Configure your Growatt inverter connection. Choose between TCP (Ethernet/WiFi adapter like EW11) or Serial (USB-to-RS485 adapter).

data_description.name: Friendly name for this inverter
data_description.connection_type: How to connect to your inverter

tcp.title: TCP Connection Settings
tcp.description: Configure TCP connection to your RS485-to-Ethernet/WiFi adapter (EW11, USR-W630, etc.)

data_description.host: IP address of your RS485-to-TCP converter

serial.title: Serial Connection Settings
serial.description: Configure serial connection to your USB-to-RS485 adapter

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to inverter. Check your connection settings and wiring.

init.title: Growatt Modbus Options
init.description: Configure device name, polling settings, and grid power options

data_description.device_name: Friendly name for the device (appears before all sensor names)
data_description.scan_interval: How often to poll the inverter for new data (5-300 seconds)
data_description.timeout: How long to wait for responses from the inverter (1-60 seconds)
data_description.invert_grid_power: Enable if CT clamp installed backwards (import/export swapped)
